existing_features.title: In the AdminPage article form, replace the image file upload input (file picker / <input type='file'>) with a text input field that accepts a URL/link to an image file. The field label should read 'Image URL' and accept a standard HTTP/HTTPS URL string. The submitted image URL should be stored and used wherever article images are rendered.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change upload image option to a link-to-file input instead of file upload
